name: google-calendar
title: Google Calendar
description: Raycast extension to manage Google Calendar
author: guy_waldman

commands.name: upcoming-events
commands.title: Upcoming Google Calendar Events
commands.subtitle: List upcoming events from your Google Calendars
commands.description: List upcoming events from your Google Calendars

commands.name: create-event
commands.title: Create Google Calendar Event
commands.subtitle: Create a new Google Calendar Event
commands.description: Create a new Google Calendar Event

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
